original_text: Afterward his brother came out with his hand holding Esau's heel, so his name was called Jacob. Isaac was sixty years old when she bore them.
korean_text: 후에 나온 아우는 손으로 에서의 발꿈치를 잡았으므로 그 이름을 야곱이라 하였으며 리브가가 그들을 낳을 때에 이삭이 육십 세였더라

sentences.original_text: with his hand holding Esau's heel
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손은 에서의 발꿈치를 잡고 있었고

sentences.original_text: so his name was called Jacob
